answers.answer: I took Clozaril for a while but honestly I couldn't tolerate it although some people can. It can cause blood dyscreias and requires a weekly bloodtest, has a strong potential to cause diabetes and weight gain and is extremely sedating among multiple other side effects. It is generally prescribed by psychiatrists when a person cannot tolerate all known antipsychotics or has developed tardive dyskinesia as its the only known antipsychotic that can't cause or worsen it.

question: I would like to subsitutue my medication for something else and I am curious if anyone has tried this medication. How did it work for you.I was prescribed abilify for mood disorder/depression, so just want to know if there is anything out there beside abiliffy.thanks to all
title: what is Clozaril and what are the side effects
